front.title: •Lando Calrissian, Scoundrel
front.gametext: Adds one battle destiny. If opponent initiates battle at same location, retrieve 1 Force and add its destiny number to Lando's power, or power of Falcon he is piloting. End of your turn: Use 1 Force to maintain OR Lose 2 Force to place in Used Pile OR Place out of play.
front.lore: With a silvery tongue or a rapid-fire blaster, Lando prides himself on being able to get out of tight situations. Is at his best when cornered.
